column5: Was out fishing with rich a week ago and caught this beauty........   What a whopper huh!  Did not have the scales to weight it.....Damn shame..  ...Reckon thats close to a record for sure.......  Put up one hell of a good fight lemme tell ya.......
is that a largie???? nice, u should get it mounted on a popsicle stick.  Sweet smile. thanx for sharing.
Dare to dream....maybe one day....  Maybe I'll ask  Santa!!!!  Thanks for the laugh
HOLY definately one of the biggest fish ive seen
nice, u should get it mounted on a popsicle stick  Well dern i never thought of that..  ...A largie mounted on a popsicle stick.....Now theres a great idea   lol
I know bassmaster  i was so excited when it hit...That fish just slammed my rod....I knew for sure it had to be a big one....and look at it WOW!!!!     chuckles
ohhh i dunno beans i reckon mine is much bigger..........lol
that may be the smallest bass I have evr seen caught (assuming it was a bass)
lol Yes it was  a BASS   & what u mean the smallest?   Its hugee!!!!!!
what do you catch something like that on?  I'll make sure never to use it!!
ooo i cant be giving away secrets like that rizzo......

i'll see ur midget bass and raise you a bass fry.  We made cosmo's at a friends cottage, played cards and i was catching minnows using a butterfly net. Together with the minnows this bass was so aggressive it attacked and nipped all the other less worthy fish.  I have another shot of this fry beside a cigg filter, it's incredibly small
Somebody has been playing around with Photo Shop.    Come on now ... show us the real one.
Hey Nautifish! LOL, nice catch, that will feed you and the boys for a night.LOL

LoL.......FISHERGRL........My boy's are greedy when it comes to food.....lol.......Thankgoodness two of them are out on they're own now, More fish for me......   lol  LOL CLEMENS  I do not have photo shop......   But i do have P.S.P    W15h1N 1 WuZ F15H1N  I would see ur bass fry for another i caught ealier in the yr dipping for minnows also but no longer have the picture. It was the same night i caught a baby Gar pike in my net!  Now that was pretty awesome.   Jason Thankyou
